title: Ms. Geist 7/17: Portland, National Tattoo Day, James Harden, Schools
itunes:title: Ms. Geist 7/17: Portland, National Tattoo Day, James Harden, Schools
description:
On this edition of Ms. Geist Miles and Anna discuss Secret Police invading Portland, today is National Tattoo Day, James Harden says his Blue Lives Matter face covering was just for looks, and there is much discussion around schools reopening as parents speak out in protest.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
